title: if u own all champs and skins-what happens with mystery gift then?
body: can we choose a skin from the vault like CS riven?

replies.body: You would not be eligible for mystery gifts (champions and skins wise) because you own them all
You get RP. to the value of a mystery gift.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ

You need to have at least 10 unowned skins or you can't recieve mystery gifts
